mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST( MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_TITLE, TITLE, THUMBNAIL, CONTENT, POST_PRIVATE, REG_DATE ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{categoryTitle}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, #{postPrivate}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_TITLE, TITLE, THUMBNAIL, CONTENT, POST_PRIVATE, date_format(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REGDATE FROM POST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
SELECT POST_ID, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_TITLE, TITLE, THUMBNAIL, CONTENT, POST_PRIVATE, date_format(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REGDATE FROM POST WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET CATEGORY_TITLE = #{categoryTitle}, TITLE = #{title}, THUMBNAIL = #{thumbnail}, CONTENT = #{content}, POST_PRIVATE = #{postPrivate} WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
